title: Can't load into game?
body: When I try to play a game of blind pick everything goes smooth until it's time for everyone to load in, it just stays on a black screen. Anyone else experiencing this problem ?

replies.body:
Black screens after champ select are usually a key indicator that there may be an issue with your connection to the server.  Most of the time, these are caused by network settings that are local to your PC, so I suggest working through our [connection troubleshooting guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those steps caused any change in your ability to load into matches.
Yes, everytime I load a game I get a black screen and a bug report saying data corruption and I have to apply a patch to my client. Getting sick of having leaver next to my name in my match history.
